enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: On Tuesday morning, a SBSTA round table was held on Annex I Parties` policies and measures (P&Ms).
The event, which was mandated by SBSTA 20, involved presentations and discussions aimed at sharing information and exchanging experiences in implementing P&Ms.
The meeting was divided into three parts: domestic aspects; international aspects; and cross-cutting issues.
Jonathan Pershing, World Resources Institute, facilitated the meeting.
